metadata.title: CVE-2017-7516 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2015-1197.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2015-1197. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2015-1197 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: cpio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
